=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Face Scrub by Disco for Men, Exfoliating and Cleansing, Removes Dead Skin and Build Up, All Natural and Paraben Free, Eucalyptus Scent, 2 Ounces
Review Date: 2021/05/31
Store: Disco
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Disco', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.81 x 1.81 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001694727'}
Review Text: Disco face scrub left my skin feeling soft and the smell was a plus. I have used it over the last week and have liked that it isn't too rough of a scrub.
Review Title: So far it has been working great
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Hetian Sonic Facial Cleansing Brush，Exfoliating and Waterproof Electric Face Wash Brush Deep Skin Care Tools Silicone Cleanser Scrubber Suitable for Any Skin Condition for Women (Pink)
Hetian
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.5 x 1.77 inches; 5.89 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required.', 'UPC': '791568745273', 'Manufacturer': 'Hetian'}
I've been told by my girlfriend that compared to other skin care brushes that this model is comparable or better than most. The device leaves your skin feeling softer after a few uses, so it may take more than your first use to see effects.
Noticeable difference
Bold Men, Mens Hair Brush For Head and Beard, Thick and Thin Hair Types
BOLD MEN
{'Brand': 'BOLD MEN', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Wood', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '793611800557'}
I like that this brush is small enough to fit comfortably in my palm, but I expected the bristles to be more dense like other hair/beard brushes I've used in the past. However, it works well and I have not had any issue with it at all.
Bristles are not densely packed
Spanature Olive Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
Spanature
{'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.89 x 1.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
I really liked that each lotion was individually boxed in a gift box. I kept one for myself and gifted the others and I'm kind of starting to regret it since I'm really liking how it leaves my hands feeling. The lotion left my skin feeling soft and rehydrated without that film like feeling that other lotions tend to leave
Great gift idea

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus:** The user prioritizes effective skincare tools and products, particularly electric cleansing devices that enhance skin softness and care.
- **Quality Expectation:** They seek noticeable improvements over time, expressing a preference for gradual results rather than instant effects.
- **Influenced by Recommendations:** The user highly values peer suggestions, relying on trusted opinions for selecting skincare and grooming products.
- **Willingness to Experiment:** They are open to trying different brands and models, often choosing products based on positive personal feedback, and expanding their exploration into grooming items.
- **Grooming Interest:** Recent interactions reveal a growing interest in grooming products, including hair and beard brushes and exfoliating scrubs, evaluating them on usability, design, and efficacy for skin softness.
- **Moisturizer Appreciation:** Their preference for moisturizers that provide hydration without greasiness suggests a focus on multi-use products. They enjoy giftable items, indicating a thoughtful approach to personal care that values sharing quality products with others.
- **Emphasis on Natural Ingredients:** The user shows a preference for products that are natural and gentle on the skin, further enriching their skincare routine with products that enhance overall skin health.

Overall, the user demonstrates a discerning and exploratory approach to personal care, valuing gradual efficacy, peer recommendations, quality across skincare and grooming categories, and an appreciation for natural formulations.
